name: Celine Demo.
description:
Princess Celine and her guards, Leon the wolf and Diego the Rabbit have managed to make it to the forest in which houses the Crystal which says to hold the power to save their kingdom. Unfortunately they are not the only ones looking for it...

This is a short demo that can be completed in 11 minutes or so. 

I plan on making a full game with better sprites, gameplay, music, and sounds, so if you enjoy it or have played it, Then please do rate the game and tell me what you think about it.

Controls - 

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

W - Jump

Space - Interact/Menu selector

Esc - Go fullscreen
